FoodItem.name: Steak and Kidney Pie
FoodItem.description: Tender cubes of steak, with tender lamb kidney is succulent rich gravy. Served with a side of mashed potatoes and peas.

FoodItem.name: Toad in the Hole
FoodItem.description: Plump British Pork sausages backed in a light batter. Served with mixed vegetables and a brown onion gravy.

FoodItem.name: Ploughmanâ€™s Salad
FoodItem.description: Pork Pie, Pickled Onions, Pickled relish Stilton and Cheddar cheeses and crusty French bread.

FoodItem.name: Fish and Chips
FoodItem.description: A large piece of Cod in a covered in a light crisp batter, recipe is a family secret, with a side of Chips and Mushy Peas. Scraps available by request at no extra charge.

FoodItem.name: Fish and Chips
FoodItem.description: A smaller portion of our Dinner version

FoodItem.name: Traditional English Breakfast
FoodItem.description: The breakfast of champions. 2 Fried eggs, 1 English pork sausage, 1 Back Bacon, 2 pieces of black pudding, baked beans, and 1 slice of fried bread. Served with Brown Sauce

FoodItem.name: Irish Breakfast
FoodItem.description: The Irish version of the English breakfast. 2 Fried eggs, 1 Irish pork sausage, 1 rasher, 1 piece of black pudding, 1 piece of white pudding, baked beans, and Irish soda bread.

FoodItem.name: Sausage Roll
FoodItem.description: English sausage meat wrapped in a flakey pastry. Served with Brown Sauce

FoodItem.name: Scotch Egg
FoodItem.description: A hard-boiled egg, wrapped in pork sausage meat. Covered in breadcrumbs and deep-fried. Served cold with a side of picked relish.

FoodItem.name: Prawn Cocktail Flavoured Crisps
FoodItem.description: The classic exotic crisp flavour.

FoodItem.name: Cheese and Onion Flavoured Crisps
FoodItem.description: Mum's favourite.

FoodItem.name: Spotted Dick
FoodItem.description: The Classic Desert. Steamed suet pudding with currents covered in custard

FoodItem.name: Eton Mess
FoodItem.description: Favourite of the old Boys. A mixture of strawberries, pieces of meringue and cream. Old school tie not included!

FoodItem.name: Jam Roly-Poly
FoodItem.description: Strawberry Jam rolled up in a suet pudding. Served with Custard

FoodItem.name: Chip Butty
FoodItem.description: A soft white roll, slathered with butter and filled with Chips fresh out of the fryer

FoodItem.name: Pickled Onions
FoodItem.description: Golf ball sized onions pickled in vinegar and assorted spices. These onions bite back

FoodItem.name: Pickled Eggs
FoodItem.description: Large hard-boiled eggs pickled in vinegar and assorted spices. These onions bite back

FoodItem.name: Mashed Potatoes
FoodItem.description: Hand Mashed potatoes

FoodItem.name: Cracklin
FoodItem.description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

FoodItem.name: Lancashire Hotpot
FoodItem.description: The famous English Lamb and Mutton stew. Tender succulent pieces of Lamb and Mutton topped with sliced potatoes, slow roasted in the oven.

FoodItem.name: Faggots
FoodItem.description: Succulent meatballs made from ground pig's heart, livers and pork belly. Served with a brown gravy mashed potatoes and peas

FoodItem.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
FoodItem.description: Britain new national dish. Chunks of roasted chicken in a mildly spicy Masala sauce. Served with Basmati rice

FoodItem.name: Glazed Doughnut
FoodItem.description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar glaze.

FoodItem.name: Jelly Doughnut
FoodItem.description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar, and filled with strawberry jelly.

FoodItem.name: Hamburger
FoodItem.description: Despite the name, ground beef cooked over a charcoal grill with a side of French Fries.

FoodItem.name: Cheeseburger
FoodItem.description: Same as the Hamburger with a side of cheddar cheese added.

FoodItem.name: Meatloaf and Mashed Potatoes
FoodItem.description: Meatloaf, Mashed Potatoes, Brown gravy and Broccoli.

FoodItem.name: Pazooki
FoodItem.description: A large 6 inch round chocolate chip cookie, served warm with 3 large scoops of vanilla ice cream.

FoodItem.name: Banana Split
FoodItem.description: One banana cut lengthwise served with scoops of vanilla, chocolate and strawberry ice cream and topped with Pineapple, chocolate and strawberry syrup.

FoodItem.name: Pot Roast
FoodItem.description: Beef with vegetables slow cooked for a minimum of 8 hours

FoodItem.name: Southern Fried Chicken with Waffle
FoodItem.description: Southern fried chicken, savoury waffles and smokey maple syrup

FoodItem.name: Pork Rinds
FoodItem.description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

FoodItem.name: Bacon Wrapped Hot Dog
FoodItem.description: Take one hot dog, wrap it in bacon and cook until the bacon is nice and crisp. Then place it in the bun.

FoodItem.name: Hushpuppies
FoodItem.description: Cornbread dough deep fired served with a variety of dipping sauces.

FoodItem.name: Biscuits and Gravy
FoodItem.description: This is a hearty breakfast favorite. Biscuits served with hot sausage gravy

FoodItem.name: Sweet Potato Fries
FoodItem.description: Sweet potatoes, thinly sliced and fried in Canola Oil

FoodItem.name: Grits
FoodItem.description: Creamy cornmeal served with butter

FoodItem.name: Grilled Cheese and Ham
FoodItem.description: Sliced ham, American cheese between two slices of White bread buttered on the outside and then fried.

FoodItem.name: Succotash
FoodItem.description: Our version consists of: corn, lima beans, green pepper and sweet red peppers. Cooked in a casserole to form a light pie crust

FoodItem.name: Rocky Mountain Oysters
FoodItem.description: Bull calf testicles, lightly seasoned, covered in flour and deep-fried. Served with cocktail sauce

FoodItem.name: Jambalaya
FoodItem.description: Creole style Jambalaya, with chicken, andouille sausage, tomatoes, onions, crawfish and rice. Good enough to have you Fais-do-do-ing

FoodItem.name: Crawfish Etouffee
FoodItem.description: Thick Crawfish stew served over Dirty Rice

FoodItem.name: Dirty Rice
FoodItem.description: American long grain rice with finely chopped chicken livers and giblets.

FoodItem.name: Lamb Vindaloo
FoodItem.description: Spicy curry from southern India. Served with basmati rice.

FoodItem.name: Aloo Gobi
FoodItem.description: A mild cauliflower and potato dish

FoodItem.name: The All American Breakfast
FoodItem.description: Two fried eggs, Sausage (patty or link), crispy bacon, pancakes and maple syrup

FoodItem.name: Swede
FoodItem.description: Hand Mashed Swede
